title: What is an online free short-term skill course? - Quora

response.answer_text: Abacus learning is advisable. Lot of packages are available. You can either chose short term course or life time access to learn abacus.Live classes/ Learning portal are the two options. Basic /Gold/ Premium portal /Nurture package are the different schemes. Basic covers 4 levels of abacus learning where as premium covers all levels of abacus learning.Other courses are spellbee program /handwriting course/ Yoga /Puzzles /Teachers training course #abacus learning portal #Teachers training course(abacus)
